website_summaries.verdict: Nice craftsmanship in a travel kit that will keep your small items well-organized. Also great to take along for short trips or overnight stays.
pros: This small bag offers TUMI's quality and features, yet comes in a size that's designed for organizing small items like toiletries
Has lots of pockets and space
Ballistic nylon will withstand years of use
Has a hanger for easy access and comes with the TUMI Tracer program
cons: Zippers seem somewhat flimsy, and occasionally jam
Price is high for a bag of its size

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape
customer_reviews.text: The Tumi is a great size and shape. My son loves it except he wishes it have a couple more pockets and/or small straps to hold things. The product is well made of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: DKK

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not $$$ good.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice enough toiletry bag, but everything Tumi makes is massively over priced. So long as you know there are $20 versions out there that function just as well and are okay with this fact, I wouldn't try to stop you from purchasing this bag.
customer_reviews.author: jlhbird

customer_reviews.title: Good choice but expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Price driven for the name no doubt but it's a solid, high quality product . Several extra compartments for smaller items. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Adam Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Tumi always delivers the highest quality products. Highly recommend for the frequent traveler. Durable and carries quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Travelers wanted
customer_reviews.text: The perfect travel bag! If you can afford the leather, go for it! Yes a little big but worth the space in your luggage.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Large !
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great ! My regular shaving bags don't have enough room or compartments but this bag is double the size of regular shaving bags and has multiple pockets. Great quality and priced along those qualities too.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: I think I am finally satisfied with this one
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at many, and purchased many, of these toiletry bags. I think I am finally satisfied with this one. Organization is good. Build quality is outstanding. Size is adequate, but not too large.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Travel Kit
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend travels a lot, and he was long overdue for a new travel kit. He loves this one; very roomy without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher95

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for extensive traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Great travel kit. Took to Europe for two weeks and it worked like a charm. Lots of storage slots and organizational cability. String zippers made it easy to overstuff and keep all liquids in their place.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: It is very good. This was purchased for a gift so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Have a tumi dopp bag for years. It is very good. This was purchased for a gift so I have not used it myself. It appears to be high quality and has more storage than my original bag. PMM
customer_reviews.author: patrick m. mulqueeney

customer_reviews.title: great dopp
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one (my first was stolen due to luggage theft). These are great - voluminous, lots of places to store things. Looks good, and matches the rest of my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Renner

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars well deserved
customer_reviews.text: It’s fantastic once I have this bag, challenging to return to any other travel bag!
customer_reviews.author: A.K.R

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price. Will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: I was hestitant to buy this as lots of times 'luxury' brands are just okay products with a designer label. And this being simply a synthetic material I wasn't sure it was worth $135 but as soon as it arrived I knew I made the right decision. It is perfect. Extremely well made and very very well thought out on functionability. Look is simple and without seeing the minimalist logo on the bottom you'd prob not know the maker. If you want a bag that says 'look I paid a lot' get a different one. But if you want a very useable, high quality bag and that is what is important to you. This one is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Design2Connect

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new travel bag and this fit the spot. It has ample room inside to hold everything I need. The case feels very solid and the zippers are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the item discribed. Item received was “not” the hanging kit.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carrin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and very study
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and very study. A lot of room for traveling stuff. Would definitely recommend it. It is, however, a bit pricy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great toiletry bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for travels and it's the perfect size for his lotions, colognes and shampoo/conditioner. It also is the same material as his tumi suitcase and is a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Hourglass Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design and just the right size for my travel needs.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: I have one of these for traveling, and one ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these for traveling, and one of these for the gym. They are rugged and well-designed. Everything fits intuitively.
customer_reviews.author: Tmus

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. My wife loves it. Used on ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. My wife loves it. Used on trip to London and kept all her cosmetics organized and readily available.
customer_reviews.author: 1973 Hog

customer_reviews.title: ... this bag because when I go on trips I like to take normal size bottles (which is about 16 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because when I go on trips I like to take normal size bottles (which is about 16 fl ounces)like for example body wash and face wash and shampoo bottles. I also have an electric toothbrush (which is bigger than a normal toothbrush) and it all fits perfectly with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, flexible, plenty of space, easy access and use. May be on the larger size for a toiletry kit but it suits my business and personal travel needs well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but nice.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have spent less on regular sized suitcases. Not a Tumi of course. I take long trips and bring all the comforts of home. This bag fits them all in nicely and has a lot of useful nooks and pockets for medicine, cuff links, you name it.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy, classic TUMI. This is my second one. The first lasted 5 years with my travel.
customer_reviews.author: Henry A. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Cool soap bag for men
customer_reviews.text: Came as ordered. Cool soap bag for men. Will hold everything needed
customer_reviews.author: Simon Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling.
customer_reviews.text: This is in my book an expensive indulgence but a good one. Over $100 for a dob kit is a little much but it works very well and was the largest dob kit I could find. Its very well made, has a great internal hook for hanging while traveling. The side pockets are very functional and I use them extensively. Was somewhat concerned about the cost but I have really liked traveling with this travel kit. I would recommend it for someone looking for a larger dob kit who is not concerned about the cost.
customer_reviews.author: JP Norman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my travel needs. About the size of a pair of sneakers side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: quite spacious, with enough space to fit in most of the travel requirements
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a fully loaded toiletry kit. It's very well made too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Szeto

customer_reviews.title: I found this to be the perfect size for my needs
customer_reviews.text: As an experienced world traveller, I found this to be the perfect size for my needs. Good quality build and materials. My local TUMI store monogrammed item with my initials for free. Amazon had the best price. Completed my Alpha Collection.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to access the interior
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to store and retrieve contents. Prefer it's predecessor which had access to it's interior from the large side of the case.
customer_reviews.author: siskal

customer_reviews.title: This works much better when not hanging
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my existing travel kit. I found it to be larger than expected and actually found it did not hold my travel items as well as my existing travel kit. I had upgraded my purchase to have the hanging kit, but found that when hanging, the kit tipped forward from the weight, and my electric razor almost fell out. This works much better when not hanging, and would be a better choice if it zipped from the side when laying flat. For the price, I believe there are better choices.
customer_reviews.author: IBMrT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case that holds all my toiletries. Love the hangar that helps in crowded hotel bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Sackowitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size bag, nice compartments to fit all of the little things.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie L

customer_reviews.title: Very Excited
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even traveled yet and this bad boy is packed and ready to go. Here's to the last travel kit I will ever need!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I use this w/ my Tumi expandable laptop bag. Holds my Tom Tom, power supply for I Phone & Dell laptop, bluetooth mouse, MiFi, Bose headphones and various other misc items all in one bag! Big pockets on each side, I usually have an extra laptop charger in one of the pockets since I like to keep one charger in the hotel room and one w/ me when on a client site. The other pocket keeps pens, keys, ID badges, etc. I travel weekly and anything that can help organize me is A+!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wegerson

customer_reviews.title: No surprises and no disappointments
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for someone who already had some Tumi products. Needless to say it was a big hit and I enjoyed giving such a well received present.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Absolute overpriced garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute overpriced garbage! The handle on the side ripped after just 5 months of light use. This will be the last piece of Tumi luggage I will ever purchase! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great just does not hold everything
customer_reviews.text: I use this every week. It is a lot smaller than I thought. Works great just does not hold everything.
customer_reviews.author: Grill Buff

customer_reviews.title: I obtained this one by individual importing.
customer_reviews.text: For me,this one is the first TUMI bag. TUMI is the famous brand,that is a high-quality article in Japan. This time,I purchased it because I was interested. The impression,If you put it on the floor like the image photo,some stability may be bad. But,you come to should devise how to put in baggage. By the way,the individual importing is easily for me than I thought. But,in the case of from Japan,because the Import Fees Deposit and the shipping cost is needed, please be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Katsuhiro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bag.
customer_reviews.text: Its pricey.. but its VERY well made and designed. My favorite travel toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: BluesHarp

product_meta.title: TUMI - Alpha 2 Hanging Travel Kit - Luggage Accessories Toiletry Bag for Men and Women - Black
product_meta.description: Tumi elevates your travel and business experience with Alpha 2-the pinnacle of our design innovation, engineering, functionality and performance. The collection embodies Tumi's commitment to making the best better; it incorporates design and feature improvements as well as Tumi's proprietary and patented technology. Alpha 2's soft travel and business cases are characterized by ultra streamlined designs, clean and modern styling details and advanced functionality. This versatile leather travel kit is designed to hang from virtually any fixture and sit on flat surfaces. It features an easy-access U-zip opening to the main compartment and two exterior side zip pockets. The interior has open, zip and mesh pockets as well as small elastic loops. Anti-bacterial lining. Made from Tumi's ballistic nylon.
feature_bullets: EXTERNAL FEATURES: U-zip opening to main compartment; side zip pockets
INTERNAL FEATURES: Hanging hook; mesh zip pockets; zip pockets; open pocket; elastic loops; anti-bacterial lining; TUMI tracer
DIMENSIONS: Dimenions in inches 4" X 11.75" X 8"; weight 0.4 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
